name: Khaled Jamal Malowalain, MBA
about: An Operations Associate at a leading cryptocurrency mining company, looking forward to connecting with like minded people and building long lasting relationships.

experience.title: Operations Associate
experience.description: - Collaborate with our team of mining specialists to formulate and execute strategic purchasing plans, ensuring that we procure the necessary equipment at the most competitive prices.- Contribute to the optimization of our Bitcoin, Kadena, Ethereum, and Litecoin mining and hosting services, emphasizing efficiency and long-term profitability. - Dedicated to overseeing all facets of operations, encompassing distribution, exceptional customer service, HR management, efficient administration, and dynamic sales strategies.- Strategically network to enhance the branch and company's reputation, communicating clear expectations to vendors and contractors, ensuring timely deliverables, adherence to budgetary targets, and site-specific requirements.- Deliver top-tier client support across multiple platforms, including ZenDesk, Telegram, Discord, Email, and others, providing an exceptional client experience.
experience.description_html: - Collaborate with our team of mining specialists to formulate and execute strategic purchasing plans, ensuring that we procure the necessary equipment at the most competitive prices.- Contribute to the optimization of our Bitcoin, Kadena, Ethereum, and Litecoin mining and hosting services, emphasizing efficiency and long-term profitability. - Dedicated to overseeing all facets of operations, encompassing distribution, exceptional customer service, HR management, efficient administration, and dynamic sales strategies.- Strategically network to enhance the branch and company's reputation, communicating clear expectations to vendors and contractors, ensuring timely deliverables, adherence to budgetary targets, and site-specific requirements.- Deliver top-tier client support across multiple platforms, including ZenDesk, Telegram, Discord, Email, and others, providing an exceptional client experience.

experience.title: Account Executive
experience.description: Direct Marketing and Sales Account Executive. Responsibilities Included :• Conducting events based presentations for our clients• Creating brand awareness and business development• Learning the foundations of sales and marketing techniques• Training and developing new representatives• Creating and updating customer accounts• Giving creative ideas regarding sales and customer service• Completing the sales process from start to finish- Worked on Assurance Wireless, T- Mobile Campaign.
